title: Water Analysis Data Schema
description: Water analysis includes properties captured in the DDMS like: Color, TDS (Total Dissolved Solids), TSS (Total Suspended Solids), Salinity, Resistivity, FreeChlorine, WeakBases, Bicarbonate, SulfurTotal, abundance of individual anions and cations. Note that this analysis represents water analyses historically captured in the geochemistry databases and water analyses reported in PVT reports. (Note that water isotopes are captured in a separate Isotope.Non-Gas category.)

SamplesAnalysisID.title: Samples Analysis ID
SamplesAnalysisID.description: The OSDU Identifier for this SamplesAnalysis.

SampleID.title: Sample ID
SampleID.description: The OSDU Identifier for the Sample associated with this analysis.

Meta.title: Meta
Meta.description: A meta data item, which allows the association of named properties or property values to a Unit/Measurement/CRS/Azimuth/Time context.

items.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data Item
items.description: A meta data item, which allows the association of named properties or property values to a Unit/Measurement/CRS/Azimuth/Time context.

kind.title: UOM Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, 'Unit' for FrameOfReferenceUOM.

name.title: UOM Unit Symbol
name.description: The unit symbol or name of the unit.

persistableReference.title: UOM Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying the Unit.

unitOfMeasureID.description: SRN to unit of measure reference.

propertyNames.title: UOM Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides Unit context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

kind.title: CRS Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, constant 'CRS' for FrameOfReferenceCRS.

persistableReference.title: CRS Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying the CRS.

propertyNames.title: CRS Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides CRS context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

kind.title: DateTime Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, constant 'DateTime', for FrameOfReferenceDateTime.

name.title: DateTime Name
name.description: The name of the DateTime format and reference.

persistableReference.title: DateTime Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying DateTime reference.

propertyNames.title: DateTime Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides DateTime context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

kind.title: AzimuthReference Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, constant 'AzimuthReference', for FrameOfReferenceAzimuthReference.

name.title: AzimuthReference Name
name.description: The name of the CRS or the symbol/name of the unit.

persistableReference.title: AzimuthReference Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying AzimuthReference.

propertyNames.title: AzimuthReference Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides AzimuthReference context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

TestNumber.title: Test Number
TestNumber.description: A number for this test for purposes of e.g., tracking lab sequence.

WaterAnalysisMethodID.title: Water Analysis Method ID
WaterAnalysisMethodID.description: The method used for this analysis.

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.description: Array object capturing remarks or additional information for this test step.  Remarks for the analysis as a whole should be captured in the associated SamplesAnalysis work product component.

items.title: AbstractRemark
items.description: A remark object, pairing a remark text with a source, e.g. an author, and a date, which is typically included in an array. The RemarkSequenceNumber acts as unique key in this case.

RemarkSequenceNumber.title: Remark Sequence Number
RemarkSequenceNumber.description: A unique identifier for each remark record. This identifier is used to uniquely identify a member in an array of remarks.

Remark.title: Remark
Remark.description: A descriptive comment for this remark.

RemarkSource.title: Remark Source
RemarkSource.description: The person, vendor, interpreter or other provider of information.

RemarkDate.title: Remark Date
RemarkDate.description: The date the remark was issued.

AnalysisPressure.title: Analysis Pressure
AnalysisPressure.description: The pressure at which the water sample is analyzed to determine its various properties and dissolved gases content.

DissolvedCO2.title: Dissolved CO2
DissolvedCO2.description: The concentration of carbon dioxide gas dissolved in the water sample.

DissolvedH2S.title: Dissolved H2S
DissolvedH2S.description: The concentration of hydrogen sulfide gas dissolved in the water sample.

DissolvedO2.title: Dissolved O2
DissolvedO2.description: The concentration of oxygen gas dissolved in the water sample.

Resistivity.title: Resistivity
Resistivity.description: The electrical resistance of the water sample, often used to infer ion concentration.

FluidResistivityMeasurementMethodID.title: Fluid Resistivity Measurement Method ID
FluidResistivityMeasurementMethodID.description: Method by which the resistivity of the fluid sample was measured.

Temperature.title: Temperature
Temperature.description: The temperature at which resistivity was measured.

Viscosity.title: Viscosity
Viscosity.description: The measure of the water sample's resistance to flow or deformation.

SolutionGasWaterRatio.title: Solution Gas Water Ratio
SolutionGasWaterRatio.description: The ratio of the volume of gas dissolved in the water to the volume of the water sample.

WaterViscousCompressibility.title: Water Viscous Compressibility
WaterViscousCompressibility.description: The measure of the change in water viscosity under varying pressure conditions.

WaterDensity.title: Water Density
WaterDensity.description: The mass per unit volume of the water sample.

Temperature.title: Temperature
Temperature.description: The temperature at which Water Density was recorded.

WaterSpecificHeat.title: Water Specific Heat
WaterSpecificHeat.description: The amount of heat required to raise the temperature of a unit mass of water by one degree Celsius.

WaterFormationVolumeFactor.title: Water Formation Volume Factor
WaterFormationVolumeFactor.description: The ratio of the volume of water in reservoir conditions to its volume at surface conditions.

WaterHeatCapacity.title: Water Heat Capacity
WaterHeatCapacity.description: The total amount of heat required to raise the temperature of the water sample by one degree Celsius.

WaterIsothermalCompressibility.title: Water Isothermal Compressibility
WaterIsothermalCompressibility.description: The measure of the relative change in the volume of the water with respect to changes in pressure at constant temperature.

WaterThermalConductivity.title: Water Thermal Conductivity
WaterThermalConductivity.description: The ability of the water sample to conduct heat.

WaterThermalExpansion.title: Water Thermal Expansion
WaterThermalExpansion.description: The measure of the change in volume of the water sample as a result of a temperature change.

WaterEnthalpy.title: Water Enthalpy
WaterEnthalpy.description: The total heat content of the water sample.

WaterEntropy.title: Water Entropy
WaterEntropy.description: The amount of energy in the water sample that is not available for doing work.

WaterSpecificVolume.title: Water Specific Volume
WaterSpecificVolume.description: The inverse of water density, indicating the volume occupied by a unit mass of water.

Salinity.title: Salinity
Salinity.description: The total concentration of dissolved salts in the water sample.

Temperature.title: Temperature
Temperature.description: The temperature at which salinity was measured.

TotalDissolvedSolids.title: Total Dissolved Solids
TotalDissolvedSolids.description: The total concentration of solid substances dissolved in the water sample.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: A classification that identifies the various types of inorganic and organic substances dissolved in water, including salts, minerals, metals, cations, anions, and small organic molecules, which contribute to the overall concentration of total dissolved solids (TDS) in the water sample.

TotalSuspendedSolids.title: Total Suspended Solids
TotalSuspendedSolids.description: The total concentration of particles suspended in the water sample.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: A classification that identifies the various particles and solid substances suspended in water, which contribute to the overall concentration of total suspended solids (TSS); these include silt, clay, organic matter, algae, and microorganisms, which can affect water clarity and quality.

TotalHardness.title: Total Hardness
TotalHardness.description: The concentration of multivalent cations, primarily calcium and magnesium ions, in the water sample.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: A classification that identifies the various sources and types of hardness-causing ions in the water sample, primarily focusing on divalent metal cations such as calcium and magnesium, which contribute to the overall hardness of the water.

TotalAlkalinity.title: Total Alkalinity
TotalAlkalinity.description: The capacity of the water sample to neutralize acids, primarily due to the presence of bicarbonates, carbonates, and hydroxides.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: A classification that identifies the various sources and types of alkalinity in the water sample, primarily focusing on bicarbonates, carbonates, and hydroxides, which contribute to the overall buffering capacity of the water.

TotalSedimentSolids.title: Total Sediment Solids
TotalSedimentSolids.description: The total concentration of sediment particles within the water sample.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: A classification that identifies the various particles and solid substances suspended in the water sample, including organic matter, silt, clay, and other inorganic materials, which contribute to the overall concentration of total sediment solids (TSS) and affect the clarity and quality of the water.

pH.title: pH
pH.description: A measure of the acidity or alkalinity of the water sample, based on the concentration of hydrogen ions.

PHMeasurementMethodID.title: PH Measurement Method ID
PHMeasurementMethodID.description: The method by which pH was measured.

Temperature.title: Temperature
Temperature.description: The temperature at which pH was measured.

Conductivity.title: Conductivity
Conductivity.description: The measure of the water sample’s ability to conduct electrical current, related to the concentration of ions in the water.

ConductivityMeasurementMethodID.title: Conductivity Measurement Method ID
ConductivityMeasurementMethodID.description: The method by which Conductivity was measured.

Temperature.title: Temperature
Temperature.description: The temperature at which Conductivity was recorded.

WaterSampleComponent.title: Water Sample Component
WaterSampleComponent.description: Array capturing the components and concentrations from the water sample during the analysis.

items.title: Water Sample Component
items.description: Array capturing the components and concentrations from the water sample during the analysis.

Anions.title: Anions
Anions.description: Array capturing the name and measurement method of the anions in the sample.

items.title: Anions
items.description: Array capturing the name and measurement method of the anions in the sample.

ElementalMeasurementMethodID.title: Elemental Measurement Method ID
ElementalMeasurementMethodID.description: Method of measurement for this component.

Cations.title: Cations
Cations.description: Array capturing the name and measurement method of the cations in the sample.

items.title: Cations
items.description: Array capturing the name and measurement method of the cations in the sample.

ElementalMeasurementMethodID.title: Elemental Measurement Method ID
ElementalMeasurementMethodID.description: Method of measurement for this component.

DissolvedMetals.title: Dissolved Metals
DissolvedMetals.description: Array capturing the name and measurement method of the dissolved metals in the sample.

items.title: Dissolved Metals
items.description: Array capturing the name and measurement method of the dissolved metals in the sample.

ElementalMeasurementMethodID.title: Elemental Measurement Method ID
ElementalMeasurementMethodID.description: Method of measurement for this component.

OrganicAcids.title: Organic Acids
OrganicAcids.description: Array capturing the name and measurement method of the organic acids in the sample.

items.title: Organic Acids
items.description: Array capturing the name and measurement method of the organic acids in the sample.

ElementalMeasurementMethodID.title: Elemental Measurement Method ID
ElementalMeasurementMethodID.description: Method of measurement for this component.

IonDifference.title: Ion Difference
IonDifference.description: The ion difference of this component.

MolarConcentration.title: Molar Concentration
MolarConcentration.description: The molar concentration of this component

VolumeConcentration.title: Volume Concentration
VolumeConcentration.description: The volume concentration of this component.

MassConcentration.title: Mass Concentration
MassConcentration.description: The mass concentration of this component.

EquivalentConcentration.title: Equivalent Concentration
EquivalentConcentration.description: The equivalent concentration of this component.
EquivalentConcentration.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

ConcentrationRelativeToDetectableLimits.title: Concentration Relative To Detectable Limits
ConcentrationRelativeToDetectableLimits.description: The concentration of this component relative to the detectable limits of the experiment.
ConcentrationRelativeToDetectableLimits.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.description: Additional notes or observations regarding the test, conditions, or results that may be relevant for interpretation.

RemarkSequenceNumber.title: Remark Sequence Number
RemarkSequenceNumber.description: A unique identifier for each remark record. This identifier is used to uniquely identify a member in an array of remarks.

Remark.title: Remark
Remark.description: A descriptive comment for this remark.

RemarkSource.title: Remark Source
RemarkSource.description: The person, vendor, interpreter or other provider of information.

RemarkDate.title: Remark Date
RemarkDate.description: The date the remark was issued.
